website_summaries.verdict: These poles come at a low price and are made by one of the oldest brands in ski equipment.
pros: The aluminum shafts are lightweight and make these poles ideal for beginner or intermediate skiiers
Their fig color option is popular for its unique and identifiable design
cons: A few customers reported that the paint chips easily and the straps may become frayed

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for about 3 days of skiing and they work great and look amazing! Can't really think of much else to say-- they do the job and look good while doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: These are great lightweight poles that I truly believe have improved my skiing form. Easy to grip, even without the straps. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Fig color and absolutely love my new ski poles! Great quality, unique color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Standard ski poles. They get the job done. Considering the price the grip was decent.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic Shopper C

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good design & color, ski with them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great poles
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for my daughter. Price was good. Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: Saved a little money
customer_reviews.text: Just right. Cheaper than REI & I like the color better
customer_reviews.author: DowntownJulie

customer_reviews.title: Good basic ski poles.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic ski poles fit for purpose. They are really more dark gray than black.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Le Blond

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: The strap ripped unraveled within the first day of skiing and the paint is scratching rubbing off. But besides that they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great poles, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These poles are awesome for the price and great quality, they’re nice and light, but arable and durable. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Zuccaro

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, low quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a first time ski trip, first slope and one of the poles bent at the base. These are very cheaply made and quite honestly a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I really loved it. It is very cute and has such a cute color. I got lots of compliments 😊
customer_reviews.author: Binita

customer_reviews.title: nice, value poles
customer_reviews.text: i just needed ski poles. these were the right size at the right price and just for bonus, great color! i can get down the slopes with great form but i will have to admit to total cluelessness about my gear. these are a good size for me. I'm 5'5"
customer_reviews.author: Fabulox

customer_reviews.title: Missing pole
customer_reviews.text: Only received one pole. Looks great but was under the impression I was buying a PAIR of poles.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Williams

customer_reviews.title: One pole what?????
customer_reviews.text: Only received one pole when nowhere in the description does it specify only one pole will be shipped
customer_reviews.author: Emily V

customer_reviews.title: Only received one ski pole
customer_reviews.text: Only got one ski pole. The paint was also scratched and chipped for being described as “new”
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gallagher

product_meta.title: Salomon Arctic Lady, 100, Black
product_meta.description: The Salomon Arctic Lady Ski Pole keeps it simple so you can focus on whats important The simple design uses a traditional adjustable wrist strap thats compatible with any gloves and the bi material grip is ergonomically shaped to fit a womans hand Add in colorways designed to match Salomons complete line and youve got a ski that works with you while giving you exactly what you need
feature_bullets: Lightweight: high quality aluminum shaft is strong and light
Ergonomic feel: specific bi-material all-mountain grip designed for women comfortably supports the hand.
Color-matched to skis: full selection of colors allows you to match any ski in the range
